= Changing case of characters in neovim =

	1. ~ invert the case of the character under the cursor (i.e. lowercase becomes UPPERCASE and vice versa)
	g~ followed by motion inverts the case of those characters
	for example: g~e, g~$, g~iw, etc
	2. gu followed by motion changes those characters to lowercase
	for example: gue, gu$, guiw, etc
	3. gU followed by motion changes those characters to UPPERCASE
	for example: gUe, gU$, gUiw, etc
